lead_paragraph: Three stories unfold on the dark and narrow streets of the ancient port city during the wild hours of New Year's Eve celebration with a rock concert in the background. Three couples, three drug-related tragedies. In the first episode, a young boy shoots his mother's lover, a drug-runner who wanted to double-cross his boss. In the second, a young junkie from a well-to-do family agrees to prostitute herself to a sailor in exchange for a fix. Finally, a young couple achieves unfortunate results when combining an acid trip with their first sexual experience.
